text: Ra prthvima bhinnaâ€“bhinna prakaraka tukra eka arkasanga mildajulda chan. Ra anguraka bagaicaharu chan, ra khetaharu chan, ra khajuraka botaharu chana, hanga bha'eka ra kunai yasta chan jasama kunai hanga chainan, sabaila'i e'utai pani pila'incha, taipani ma e'utala'i arko phalamathi uccata pradana gardachu. Yasama vud'dhimanaharuka lagi dherai cinhaharu chan
